pages.text: 26|137|( sasanea robsa puok yeung) nih kmeanoavei krawpi sasanea  robsa anak chomnean moun noh laey .
26|138|haey puok yeung ka minmen chea anak del trauv kedeak  tearounakamm noh der .

26|139|dau che  neah  puokke ban bdeseth nung ke( hou t)  haey yeung  kaban bamphlanh puokke aoy vineasa a nd reay .  pitabrakd nasa nowknong  pru tde kar noh kuchea phosdo tang muoy da chbasaleasa .  te puokke pheak  chraen ku kmean chomnue laey .
26|140|haey pitabrakd nasa  mcheasa robsa anak kuchea mcheasa mha khlangpouke  mha anet sraleanh .
26|141|krom robsa sa mou d ban bdeseth nung banda anakneasar .
26|142|nowpel sa leh del chea bangobaaun robsa puokke ban pol  towkean puokke tha  tae puok anak min kaotakhlach a l laoh te ryy
26|143|pitabrakd nasa  khnhom kuchea anakneasar mneak da smaohtrang  samreab puok anak .
26|144|dau che  neah  chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh  ning brate b tde tam  khnhom choh .
26|145|khnhom min snaesom pi puok anak nouv kamrei namuoy champoh kar ampeav  neav noh laey .  te phalbony nei kar ampeavneav robsakhnhom ku now leu  mcheasa del krobkrong piphp teangoasa .
26|146|tae puok anak( nukasman tha)  ke nung touk aoy puok anak sabbay  nung avei del mean now tinih( sa mb tde lokey) daoy so v te  th pheap ryy
26|147|nowknong suonutyean neanea  haeyning braphp tuk cheachraen .
26|148|ning damna dadoh  ning daem lmeu del phle robsa vea tn phaem  chhnganh .
26|149|haey puok anak chaoh phnom cheachraen thveuchea phteah yeang statchomneanh .
26|150|dau che  neah  chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh  ning brate b tde tam  khnhom choh .
26|151|haey chaur puok anak kom brate b tde tam batobanhchea robsa puok del  bampean aoy saoh .
26|152|del puokke bangk vineasakamm now leu phendei  ning min kekhluon  laey .
26|153|puokke ban chhlaey tha  tampit anak kreante chea anak del  sthet knongchamnaom puok del trauv m nd akm bonnaoh .

26|154|anak minmen chea avei  krawpi chea mnoussa thommotea dauch puok yeung  noh laey .  dau che  neah  chaur anak noam phosdo tang namuoy mk  brasenbae anak  chea anak del sthet knongchamnaom anak del niyeay troemotrauv men noh .

26|155|keat( sa leh) ban pol tha  nih kuchea satv audth nhi muoy  del vea mean chamnek phoektuk  haey samreab puok anak ka mean chamnek  phoektuk nei thngai delke kamnt cheakleak( towteam ven delke kamnt)  der .
26|156|haey puok anak kom bahpeal vea  daoy brakear akrak namuoy  aoy saoh  proh vea cheaheto noam aoy tearounakamm nei thngai da thomtheng nung thleak mk  leu puok anak cheaminkhan .
26|157|te puokke ban saamleh vea towvinh  ruochamk puokke kaban  klaycha anak del mean vibbadesari .
26|158|kraoyomk tearounakamm ban chhk yk puokke . pitabrakd  nasa nowknong pru tde kar noh kuchea phosdo tang muoy da chbasaleasa .  te puokke pheakochraen ku kmean chomnue laey .
26|159|haey pitabrakd nasa  mcheasa robsa anak kuchea mcheasa mha khlangpouke  mha anet sraleanh .
